artist: Designer: Frank Graham Holmes; Decorator: Schell Lewis; Manufacturer: Lenox
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Judy and Kenneth Dayton and their support of architecture in the Twin Cities
description: plate with copper luster trim; image of Monticello at center
markings: \'L [with 2 leaf fronds]/LENOX/Architects\' Tea Set/1933/Copyright\', stamped in green, on bottom of plate

title: Plate, from Architects' Tea Set
